headline: Assessing Best Buy (BBY) Valuation After JPMorgan Downgrade And Weaker Outlook Concerns
summary: JPMorgan’s downgrade of Best Buy (BBY) from Overweight to Neutral put a fresh spotlight on the retailer, with the call focused on a tougher fourth quarter and softer comparable sales expectations. See our latest analysis for Best Buy. At a share price of US$65.90, Best Buy’s recent 30 day share price return of a 4.74% decline and 90 day share price return of a 16.97% decline, alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of a 17.11% decline, suggest momentum has been fading even before...
